node.text: And white woman are largely ignorant to this history, right? America has kept it from them. Absolutely not my problem. Karen's ignorance? Hers alone.
And white woman are largely ignorant to this history, right? America has kept it from them. Absolutely not my problem. Karen's ignorance? Hers alone.

It's really important to me to teach white people that cool white people exist
.

And actually, i was way too "scared" to ask Tony. I was like, "I want to maybe run a possible idea by you in the future bc perhaps one day white liberals will be sane, perhaps, and youre the coolest person alive, so maybe you'll help me figure this out by text or smoke signal??" And he was like, "I'm in" so now I name drop him for clout
.

Lee has his own show on vice, so.. yeah. #willfuckforsocialprogress
.

And about NYU, they didn't "kick me out", Karen, the adminstration Dean, went into my account and withdrew my classes. For three semesters, NYU has been harrassing me, which ive documented here. Why? Remains unclear, likely bc I report ever instance of explicit or implict racism, which is logical. White people, particularly liberals like Karen, fail to understand the parameters of institutionalized racism, especially when it's implict
.

A bench mark of that behavior is "the rebound effect", in which white people "get offended" and replace ego with reason
.

I cant defend myself anymore. I am a straight a student, I follow every. Single. Rule (which is documented) but here is an example: walter, my cognitive behavioral professor is a racist, right? He says things like, "so imagine youre a clinician, counseling a new mother. She's dying for that blue eyed blond haired baby. She comes home with a brown haired, brown eyed baby. She didn't fail, she just didn't succeed!" Ok, fine. Gross, but who cares. People get to be racist. BUT, when it shows up in his exam? Questions designed around racialized primacy? We have an issue
.

So i tell walter. Walter ignores me. I tell water again. Still avoidant. He calls the counseling center and pathologizes me. I think the counseling center is "rational" so I say, "let's have a meeting?" I structure the meeting around teaching implict bias (bc NYU openly admits they suffer from institutionalized racism). They cancel the meeting -- they *wanted* to, as a group, repurpose the narrative. That's unacceptable
.

shit like that has been my full experience at NYU. Why? "Dismissiveness" is a marker for liberal racism, which turns into ego
.

And btw, it was important for me to address Walters exam questions bc it is *proven* that year two of *any areas of medicine*, from psychology to neurology, implict bias "roots down" during year two of study. Why? People are made to read, write flash cards, repeat-until-its memorized fraudulent, racially, gender and sexualy bigoted *medical* information. I'm not going to contribute in the creation of unsafe hospitals. No. Fuck you.

And my letters to Walter, which I tossed up here are incredibly "professional", as *was* the standard: "hey Walter, question two on the exam, which appears to be authored by you, is implictly racist. Let's set up a time to chat? I'll answer the question as it's written for now. Naturally, I'll work around any opening you have". This bitch didn't even respond. Want to know what he *did* send around immeditely after? "Self-help manuals" to the class. PETTY. this isnt "bad girls club" WERE IN-COMING CLINICIANS, you racist mediocre

It took me 9 fucking months to go from, "to be asked for my high school transcripts appears to be far afield from school policy. Please provide proof?" To "karen, please set up a time to ride my face so every word i utter tastes like your clit?" Words I stand behind still today. We're *killing* people, and i won't be part of it

And when I set out to help build "safe hospitals" I began with interviews of brilliant trans kids, many of whom were "double" minorites (black and trans) and the *self-awareness*, ability to emotionally regulate -- the intellect! and they can't even get sick because the hospital is a terror dome. That's horrifying.

We should all be ashamed, but nope! Walter and Karen are the fucking standard. Its pathetic. At Berkeley? Neurosciencists, anthropologists, endocrinologist, cardiologists, etc., Work together to advance areas of medicine to tackle this issue head-on. What happens if a pre-op trans man, whose also black, comes in with a uterine issue? Its absolutely unacceptable that it would likely throw a doctor off. No. White people, keep pace. For once

And actually, my uncle Anthony is a tenured professor at NYU (hes one of my favorite people) but I havent even reached out to him like, "for your protection, avoid me at all costs. I'm out here gunning"

-- but he's so used to this, actually. I was seven years old the first time I cussed out a homophobe. My dad took us to NYC, and we went on this carriage ride. So, we're there, enjoying it, and the coach driver mentioned that "next weekend was pride weekend" and started to talk all this shit about gay people. I made him pull over "to let my family out" -- I've always been a die-hard for equality.

And i think my "protest" style is unnerving to bigots bc "I walk alone". I don't think its effective to have a "crowd" bc honestly In directly competition with "group think", so I'll just press the shit out you, "in your own home". With white people? Cue manipulation

Even as a smaller child, Ive always been "spoiled" but had a very primal sense of unequality somehow. So, when I was *three* I bagged up all my toys, keeping only one for myself. This turtle on a string. This is in my blood from several lives ago. Its nothing to "get kicked out" by a bunch of white trash
*inequality

And I think the fact that I want to marry Marc Lamont Hill makes white people nervous. White people are *terrified* of his mind. I feel awful for him. I was creepily stalking his show on BET (its good. There is this lovely, smart female co-host that "steals the show") but it should be a *choice* to work at BET, not "you were fired from CNN, you have to feed your kid". Just bc White people can't do the work *the world suffers*. No.

And i saw that shit in my dad. Before he got to Harvard he would come home crying *every day* bc white trash at Duke thought he was "arrogant" bc that's the filter through which black intellect is fed. Its weird.

And, the most remarkable take away? People think my "push back" is "brave", and to even think that? It implies white superiority. I dont actually have that "problem". To me? All i see at NYU is white trash. It took me 9 months to get there, but yep. Trash

And, the most remarkable take away? People think my "push back" is "brave", and to even think that? It implies white superiority. I dont actually have that "problem". To me? All i see at NYU is white trash. It took me 9 months to get there, but yep. Trash

And btw, asking Karen to "choose a time to ride my face so i can take a class?" isnt "provocative" either. Within American structural codes of *learned* power dynamics, "innocence" is, historically, the cipher  through which white woman manufacture a falsified leverage, using the purity of their assigned positionality to dominate: "im too decent for you to look me in the eye, black man!!" So, to get her to understand her preditory nature? I have to collapse the counterfeit labeling, framing it in language she "understands": #metoo "jargon"

White women have a unique history of behavioral sterility that was once aligned with dignity, sanctity, class -- it drove them *crazy*; a deep and brooding jealousy was born from it, a narrative that is particularly well documented during slavery. Because the black body, both male and female was festishized, it implied a ravenous sexuality, which was false, but was juxtaposed with the torrent of white "virginity". White woman thusly *tourtured* black woman along side whit men, using their purity to create the trope of "hero": cue hanging of little black girl, innocent
